title: Panel For Turban, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk (?)
Technique: warp faced plain weave patterned by warp stripes and  extra-weft floats, inserted in shed A only, bound by every 14th or 16th foundation warp (MS'69)
provenance:
Purchased by donor in Nigeria.
Provenance supplied by donor.
dimensions:
Warp: 194 cm (6' 4")  including fringe
Weft: 63 cm (2' 3/4")  selvedge to selvedge
creditline: Gift of Mrs Calvin W. Stillman
description: Striped fabric in purple, tan, red, yellow and light blue patterned by plain bands, or bands containing lozenges or half-lozenges in yellow, green and ivory.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel For Turban, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: cotton, silk (?)
Technique: warp faced plain weave patterned by warp stripes and  extra-weft floats, inserted in shed A only, bound by every 14th or 16th foundation warp (MS'69). Gift of Mrs Calvin W. Stillman. 1969-11-6.
